mapper.insert: INSERT INTO field_info ( plant_address, plant_type, lati_long, plant_area, registation_time, user_id, user_name, user_tel, coop_name, is_end, photo_url, pre_crop, seed_source, soil_type, altitude, vegetation_type, transmittance_type, update_time, state, creator_id, guide_flag ) VALUES( #{plant_address}, #{plant_type}, #{lati_long}, #{plant_area}, #{registation_time}, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_tel}, #{coop_name}, #{is_end}, #{photo_url}, #{pre_crop}, #{seed_source}, #{soil_type}, #{altitude}, #{vegetation_type}, #{transmittance_type}, #{update_time}, #{state}, #{creator_id}, #{guide_flag} )

INSERT INTO field_record ( field_id, segment_id, photo_url, video_url, record_time, guide_flag, record_user_id, categroyID ) VALUES( #{field_id}, #{segment_id}, #{photo_url}, #{video_url}, #{record_time}, #{guide_flag}, #{record_user_id}, #{categroyID} )
mapper.select: SELECT name,telephone FROM common_user WHERE id = #{ID}
SELECT name AS coop_name FROM field_coop WHERE state='0' AND id = (SELECT coop_id FROM field_coop_member WHERE state='0' AND user_id = #{ID})

( SELECT '新建种植' AS 'record', a.id, a.user_name, NULL AS 'variety_name', NULL AS 'plant_msg', a.plant_area, a.plant_address, NULL AS step_name, NULL AS photo_url, a.registation_time AS time FROM field_info a WHERE a.state = '0' AND a.guide_flag = '0' AND a.creator_id = #{user_id} ) UNION ( SELECT '登记种植信息' AS 'record', a.id, a.user_name, d.variety_name, NULL AS 'plant_msg', NULL AS 'plant_area', NULL AS 'plant_address', c.step_name, b.photo_url, b.record_time AS time FROM field_info a LEFT JOIN field_record b ON a.id = b.field_id LEFT JOIN km_sop_step c ON b.segment_id = c.id LEFT JOIN common_medicine_variety d ON b.categroyID = d.variety_code WHERE a.state = '0' AND a.guide_flag = '0' AND a.creator_id = #{user_id} AND b.record_user_id =#{user_id} AND b.guide_flag = '0' )

SELECT b.variety_name, a.plantNum, a.seedAge FROM field_info_categroyinfo a LEFT JOIN common_medicine_variety b ON a.categroyID = b.variety_code WHERE a.fieldID = #{id}
SELECT id,step_name FROM km_sop_step WHERE sop_id = #{categroyID} ORDER BY step_order ASC
